data.name: ConfirmEmailBody
data.value:
You're almost done with your registration, @{0}!

Thank you for registering with us.

Please click the link below to confirm your email address:

Confirm Email

The confirmation link will expire in {2} minutes.

If you did not register for this account, please ignore this email.

data.name: AccountConfirmedBody
data.value:
Welcome @{0}!

Thank you for confirming your email address. Your account is now fully activated.

You can now access your account and start using our platform.

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our support team.
